title: Colombia protests: UN 'deeply alarmed' by bloodshed in Cali
content:
1. Colombia protests: UN 'deeply alarmed' by bloodshed in Cali  BBC News
  2. UN condemns violent repression of Colombia protests after at least 18 die  The Guardian
  3. Global calls for calm as Colombia deploys 'excessive force'  Bangkok Post
  4. UN human rights office urges calm, after bloodshed in Colombian city of Cali  UN News
  5. Violence in Colombia protests escalates amid allegations of police excess  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
